verses.text: O Lord, my heart is not exalted, neither have my eyes been \add haughtily\add* raised: neither have I exercised myself in great \add matters\add*, nor in things too wonderful for me.
\add I shall have sinned\add* if I have not been humble, but have exulted my soul: according to \add the relation of\add* a weaned child to his mother, so will you recompense my soul.
Let Israel hope in the Lord, from henceforth and for ever.
